response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your revenue by substantial margins. Given its unique features and market positioning, we estimate its value to be well above $1,000,000. To ensure we're on the same page regarding its worth, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a premium discount. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
